name: The Ascended (Bug)
description:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is the form that the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus crave. A true shape that cast off the burdens of humanity and has been reforged using the way of immortality.
In ancient times, those who sought immortality received wisdom from the Ambrosial Arbor and called themselves Celestials. They lived without restraints, and molded the flesh of themselves and others at will. They have long forgotten their original appearances after countless metamorphoses.

skills.name: Rite of Great Arbor Metamorphosis
skills.description: Continuously deal Wind DMG to a random target, with a high chance to cause Wind Shear.

skills.name: Guiding Vulturnus
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a target and its adjacent targets, with a high chance to cause Wind Shear.

skills.name: Arboreal Thorns
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to cause Wind Shear.

skills.name: Black Prana's Snare
skills.description: Has a high chance for all targets to become afflicted with Prana-Siphon.

skills.name: Vitals Drained
skills.description: When attacking targets in the Prana-Siphon state, the DMG dealt by this attack will be converted to the extent of Max HP reduced by Prana-Siphon, and refresh Prana-Siphon's duration. Prana-Siphon can reduce Maximum Restorable HP by up to <unbreak>50%</unbreak>.
